item.title: Overview of Rancher UI
item.description: Today, I’ll introduce you to Rancher UI, a Docker cluster management system, allowing deploy containers across multiple Docker hosts. You can manage your own Docker servers, deploy VMs on the cloud or add your Swarm, Kubernetes or Mesos existent clusters. Say hello to Rancher, the container management platform that makes everything easy. The goal of Rancher UI is to manage some Docker hosts (virtual or physical) from a Web interface which ensures container orchestration.
